subject: Fines (Penalties)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch was docked 6 points and his crew chief fined $25,000 because his car failed a postrace inspection at Pocono Raceway.
snippet: Kyle Busch was docked 6 points and his crew chief fined $25,000 because his car failed a postrace inspection at Pocono Raceway.
